meta.name: description
meta.content: Port Arthur ISD serves students and is located in Port Arthur, TX.

div.p: Governor Abbott released a statement that schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We are currently in counsel with TEA to determine how to move forward to complete this school year. Our Superintendent will post a video Monday that will speak directly to our community and address all of your concerns. We received this announcement at the same time as you, therefore, we ask for patience as we work through all scenarios to assist our students and staff with closing out this school year.

figcaption.p: Complete the survey if your child receives services from our Special Education Department
Llene la encuesta si su hijo(a) recibe services de nuestro Departamento de Educacion Especial

div.div: Governor Abbott released a statement that schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We are currently in counsel with TEA to determine how to move forward to complete this school year. Our Superintendent will post a video Monday that will speak directly to our community and address all of your concerns. We received this announcement at the same time as you, therefore, we ask for patience as we work through all scenarios to assist our students and staff with closing out this school year.

img.alt: Virtual Teacher Job Fair Featured Photo

div.div: Sign up today for our Virtual Teacher Job Fair! Registration is open from April 14 through April 29

img.alt: Schools Closed Beginning March 17 Featured Photo

div.div:
Effective March 17, 2020 all facilities and campuses of the Port Arthur Independent School District will be closed until further notice. Parents and students are asked to obtain course work which will be placed on the district and campus websites. Students are encouraged to keep up with coursework while the district facilities are closed. The educational advancement of PAISD students is of utmost concern while we navigate the next several weeks.
The district will update parents and staff regarding the next steps and expected reopening of the district facilities.

img.alt: Wheatley Remote Learning Schedule Featured Photo

div.div: Click the headline to view Wheatley's Remote Learning Schedule and Recommended Daily Schedule. Updated weekly!

Rehabilitation Act, 1973. It is the policy of the Port Arthur Independent School District not to discriminate based on race, color, age, gender, handicap, religion, or national origin in educational or vocational programs, activities or employment. For further information, please contact Mark Porterie, Ed.D. at (409) 989-6238.
